Packages 
Package Description
fr.upmc.components
Basic component model.
fr.upmc.components.connectors
Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
fr.upmc.components.cvm
Component virtual machines for both single computer and distributed deployments.
fr.upmc.components.cvm.config
Configuration of component assemblies from XML configuration files.
fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc
Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
fr.upmc.components.cvm.utils
Utilities for component virtual machines.
fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs
Basic client/server example In this example, a basic client/server is constructed.
fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.components  
fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.interfaces  
fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.ports  
fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs
Dynamic client/server example This example is meant to learn how to create and execute assembly at run-time, rather than using the static method of the assembly class to create, interconnect and start the components.
fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components
Components for the dynamic client/server example The dynamic client/server example uses three components: DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamic version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing
Smoothing pushed data.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter
Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter provides a filtering component that behaves as a sensor so that sensor clients need not know whether they are connected to sensors or filters.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge
Component and port for gauges The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge provides a gauge component used to display value read from a sensor.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng
Interfaces for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng/code> defines two kinds of random number generation components.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.interfaces
Interfaces for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.interfaces provides interfaces for random number generation components.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports
Ports for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports provides ports for random number generation components.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor
Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor provides a sensor simulator component and its port used to offer its service.
fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces
Interfaces and data for sensor services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces provides two interfaces for sensor services, a data offered interface SensorDataOfferedI for the sensor service providers and SensorDataRequiredI for the sensor service clients.
fr.upmc.components.exceptions
Exceptions for the basic component model.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.arrayBlockingQueue  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.arrayBlockingQueue.components  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.countDownLatch  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.countDownLatch.components  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.cyclicBarrier  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.cyclicBarrier.components  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.semaphore  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.semaphore.components  
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components
Le SynchronizerManager et le DistributedSynchronizerManager vont assurer la création de composants de synchronisation, présents dans le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components.syncTools.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components.syncTools
Composants/outils de synchronisation, offrant des services parfois bloquant afin de permettre à des composants clients de se synchroniser entre eux.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors
Connecteur pour l'utilisation du SynchronizerManager.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue
Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du ArrayBlockingQueue.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.countDownLatch
Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du CountDownLatch.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.cyclicBarrier
Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du CyclicBarrier.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.semaphore
Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du Semaphore.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.delegates
Component assemblies for both single computer and distributed deployments.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.interfaces
Interfaces pour l'utilisation du SynchronizerManager.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.interfaces.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue
Interfaces pour l'utilisation du ArrayBlockingQueue.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.interfaces.syncTools.countDownLatch
Interfaces pour l'utilisation du CountDownLatch.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.interfaces.syncTools.cyclicBarrier
Interfaces pour l'utilisation du CyclicBarrier.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.interfaces.syncTools.semaphore
Interfaces pour l'utilisation du Semaphore.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports
Ports d'accès au service du SynchronizerManager Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports fournit les ports inbound et outbound qui permettent d'utiliser les services du SynchronizerManager.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue
Ports d'accès aux services du ArrayBlockingQueue Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation ArrayBlockingQueue.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.countDownLatch
Ports d'accès aux services du CountDownLatch Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.countDownLatch fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation CountDownLatch.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.cyclicBarrier
Ports d'accès aux services du CyclicBarrier Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.cyclicBarrier fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation CyclicBarrier.
fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.semaphore
Ports d'accès aux services du Semaphore Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.semaphore fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation Semaphore.
fr.upmc.components.interfaces
Types of offered and required interfaces for components.
fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection
Component dynamic interconnection pattern.
fr.upmc.components.ports
Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
fr.upmc.components.registry
Global registry for the publication of component ports.
